item.description:
We went to this last year and it was super fun!

I suggest a Saturday night if possible or maybe sometime during during the holiday week, e.g. 12/27, 12/28, etc.

During the Christmas season, Edaville is transformed into a winter wonderland of holiday delights! Passengers can relax comfortably in warm and dry coaches while riding through a spectacular holiday setting featuring an explosion of lights. Kids of all ages will enjoy an array of vintage amusement rides and a visit with Santa in one of our indoor play areas. Stay for a delicious full meal or enjoy seasonal treats while roaming our beautifully decorated grounds. Last train leaves at 8 p.m.

Christmas Festival of Lights
November 16-18, 23-25, 29-30
December 1-2, 6-9, 12-24
December 26-January 1
January 3-6
(Closed Christmas Day)

Weekdays 4 pm - 9 pm
Weekends 2 pm - 9 pm
$18 Ages 2-59
$16 Seniors (over 60)
Under 2 is free

See: http://www.edaville.com/edaville_events.html
item.name: Edaville USA Festival of Lights
